column1: Smoque BBQ////Staff is very friendly and the atmosphere
column3: is nice.  It will be loud
column4: due to the number of people that are there at all times
column5: but nothing that can't keep you from having a conversation with friends.  Bottom line
column7: but I have had better.  Much better in fact in the suburbs (Steamboat in Wheaton for anyone in that area).  If I was in the area and wanting BBQ though
column8: I would not hesitate to get some Smoque.  I would just make sure I placed a to go order.
